p.k: After a tragic car crash and losing the baby she was expecting, Betty seeks solace in a new job looking after a blind kid in a mountain house

In 1940, the French army has been destroyed by Germany. Charles (Renan Carteaux) is now friends with the new leaders of the country, in particular, Jacques
In the wake of Victor’s death, Villeblanche’s estate starts trading again. Lying to the law, Eugénie (Virginie Desarnauts) frees Charles (Renan Carteaux)
A lonely, trusting old woman fears that no-one needs her anymore. She suddenly meets a young man that claims to be a distant relative
Maksim is so addicted to internet news and social media feeds that he barely notices his wife anymore. Until she surprises him with very personal and life-changing news
Criminalist Marie Vyrová is approached by a woman who is convinced that 30 ago when she was spending her vacation as a 12-year-old girl in the countryside
Investigating the death of a young woman, a police inspector finds himself exploring the torrid and mysterious side of Roma’s night life
75% The head of the local psychiatric hospital is found dead. The chief surgeon is at risk as well as many of the doctors. Will Kunes and his team arrive on time?
75% Zelejek escapes in the last minute before being captured. The town becomes more dangerous than ever as he plans his revenge
Anton asks Oksana not to linger at the hospital - he plans to celebrate their anniversary but last minute problems at work do not allow her
Oksana refuses to go to Anton's parents, who want to bless them for their upcoming marriage. Maxim looks for his daughter after she escapes from her grandparents' house
Nastya dreams to adopt a 7-year-old boy, Yegor, from an orphanage. However, the boy is not a simple kid: two criminals have been watching over him
The orphanage manager decides to cheat the thugs and find the money himself. To do this, he takes the boy away from the orphanage
